title: [Cleric Guild, Prayer Room]
description: Statues carved from dazzling coral decorate the walls of the room, each one in the likeness of a god or goddess of Liabo.  Pearls, abalone and seashells shine out from between each statue, while a large shelf of varicolored coral serves as an altar.  A flame burns behind a thick blue glass lantern, washing the room in dancing ocean-colored light.
